title: Warm Neon Café Editorial Portrait
prompt:
Ultra-realistic portrait photography of a young woman sitting gracefully inside a circular wooden decorative frame illuminated with warm neon LED lighting.

She is seated in a relaxed yet elegant pose with one leg folded and the other resting naturally, holding a small bouquet of delicate wildflowers in her hands.

The subject has a soft, natural smile with calm confidence, smooth warm medium skin tone, flawless skin texture with visible pores, natural blush, subtle makeup, soft pink lipstick, well-defined eyebrows, expressive brown eyes with gentle catchlights, and neatly tied long dark hair styled in a low ponytail with a few soft strands framing her face.

She is wearing a dusty rose pink full-sleeve knit sweater, paired with cream/beige tailored pants, and clean white chunky sneakers, accessorized with a minimal smartwatch on her wrist and small stud earrings.

The environment is a modern aesthetic café interior, decorated with lush green hanging plants, floral arrangements, and soft ambient lighting. Background elements include blurred café tables, warm wooden textures, and soft bokeh lights, creating a cozy and premium atmosphere.

Lighting is cinematic warm ambient light, with soft diffused highlights on the face, gentle rim light from the circular LED frame, balanced exposure, natural shadows, and perfect skin tones.

Shot with a full-frame DSLR camera, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, f/1.8 aperture, ISO 100, professional color grading, high dynamic range, ultra-sharp focus on subject, creamy background blur, studio-quality clarity.

Style: editorial lifestyle photography, Instagram-worthy, premium café aesthetic, modern feminine portrait, soft cinematic tones, warm pastel color palette, photorealistic, 8K resolution, ultra-detailed textures, natural proportions, realistic anatomy.

Composition: centered subject within circular frame, symmetrical balance, leading lines, depth and dimension, clean framing, no distortion.

title: Cinematic Night Street Swag Portrait on Royal Enfield
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the single and strict identity reference. Preserve the exact same face, facial proportions, skin tone, skin texture, hairstyle, hairline, and overall identity with absolutely no changes.

Ultra-realistic cinematic night lifestyle portrait of a 20-year-old stylish, slim young man (approximately 5'5" height) casually lying back on a Royal Enfield 350 motorcycle parked on an empty urban city road at night. The subject radiates calm swag confidence with relaxed, bold street attitude. Premium Instagram editorial aesthetic with cinematic yet highly realistic details.

Pose & Expression: Relaxed body posture, leaning back naturally on the motorcycle, face slightly turned sideways, eyes looking away from the camera. Jaw relaxed, lips neutral. Wearing dark, trendy rectangular sunglasses that enhance a cool, composed, confident mood.

Clothing & Style: Modern streetwear outfit, well-fitted and fashionable, clean silhouettes, premium fabric textures, subtle folds and realism. Effortless yet high-end street fashion vibe.

Lighting & Atmosphere: Soft cinematic street lighting with subtle neon reflections from surrounding city lights. Natural night shadows, gentle rim light outlining the subject and the motorcycle. Balanced contrast, realistic skin highlights, no harsh or blown-out lighting.

Environment: Empty city road at night with visible road texture. Background softly blurred with realistic urban bokeh lights. Moody but clean city atmosphere, cinematic depth of field.

Camera & Quality: Shot on a full-frame DSLR, shallow depth of field, ultra-sharp focus on the subject, natural perspective, realistic proportions. High-end fashion editorial photography style, cinematic realism, no over-processing.

Framing & Composition: Vertical 9:16 Instagram-ready composition. Subject centered with strong leading lines from the road and motorcycle. If the original reference image does not fully fit the 9:16 frame, intelligently extend the environment below near the knees and surrounding areas with realistic city road details while preserving identity accuracy.

Mood Keywords: calm, swag, confident, bold, relaxed, street style, premium lifestyle, cinematic realism.

Image Specifications: Aspect ratio 9:16, resolution 1080x1920, ultra-realistic, cinematic night portrait.
